title: Eventflow - Gamification
subtitle: How we integrated gamification techniques into EventFlow to boost user engagement with Flowcoin, resulting in increased platform interaction and enhanced user retention through rewards and incentives.

about.name: Eventflow
about.desc: Eventflow is a platform that simplifies attendee registration, ticketing, and event management. It offers customizable event pages, ticket sales tools, and smooth registration experiences for various event types, from conferences to festivals.

projectDetails_1.heading: What was the Problem?
projectDetails_1.desc:
• Managing a clinic's finances and operations and projects can be overwhelming, with multiple moving parts such as tracking and meventflowtoring expenses, and ensuring patient-related tasks are completed.
  • The client wanted a centralized system to provide real-time insights, enabling clinic administrators to efficiently manage projects, patients, forms, and analytics all in one place.

projectDetails_1.heading: What was the Goal?
projectDetails_1.desc:
To build a centralised platform healthcare platfrom that :

  • Simplifies user management with role-based filters, project assignments.
  • Provides a real-time financial dashboard for tracking sales, expenses, and refunds, while streamlining patient task management and consolidating key data for quick, informed decision-making

projectDetails_1.heading: What was the Solution?
projectDetails_1.desc:
Key Solutions Delivered:

  • Dashboard: Central hub for financial and personal metrics, including sales, expenses, refunds, and task completion.
  • Chat: Real-time messaging for team collaboration and updates.
  • Projects: Manage clinic projects, tasks, and progress tracking.
  • Procedure Pricing: Manage and update pricing for clinic procedures.
  • Forms: Create, store, and manage forms filled by the patients for inquiries
  • User Management: Handle user roles, permissions, and task assignments.
  • Admin Settings: Control panel for platform configuration and system customization.

projectDetails_1.heading: Behind the Scenes...
projectDetails_1.desc:
Understanding Client Requirements:

The client provided a basic structure of required features, which we used as a foundation to build user flows and organize data points systematically.



Research & Inspiration

To align with the clientâ€™s vision, we studied similar platforms, particularly Asana by Atlassian, to understand how user management systems function effectively.



Iterative Design Approach:

Using the research insights and client feedback, we designed and refined the platform to ensure it was comprehensive, user-friendly, and met all requirements seamlessly.

projectDetails_2.heading: Conclusion
projectDetails_2.desc:
What did we achieve from the project ?


  • We created a centralized platform that integrates financial tracking, project management, and patient task monitoring, making clinic operations more efficient and organized.
  • The platform's clean design, intuitive navigation, and role-based features ensure ease of use, enabling clinic administrators to manage complex workflows effortlessly.
